name: MODEL
description: MODEL output template (wrapped with text + data)

dimensions.crane: (integer flag, Range: 0-1, Default: 0)  // 0 by default; set to 1 when user requests crane
dimensions.truck: (integer flag, Range: 0-1, Default: 0)  // 0 by default; set to 1 when user requests truck
dimensions.hanger: (integer flag, Range: 0-1, Default: 0) // 0 by default; set to 1 when user requests hanger
dimensions.storage: (integer flag, Range: 0-1, Default: 0) // 0 by default; set to 1 when user requests storage
dimensions.aircraft: (integer flag, Range: 0-1, Default: 0) // 0 by default; set to 1 when user requests aircraft
dimensions.layerName: (string, Must be unique per session. Default: 'MODEL LIBRARY_Unknown')
